extendedInfo.description: The 3D City Run 2 is a sequel to highly successful 3D City Runner game that managed to get 5 million downloads. The 3D City Run 2 is developed by same games studio as its predecessor, Jelly.K development studio, and is using even more advanced 3D technology in order to offer more immersive and visually stunning game experience.In 3D City Run 2, you will be put into the role of Leon, the adventurer. Leonâs objective is to survive and run for his life in the streets and sewers of the city that has been hit and destroyed by unknown apocalypse. During the game you have keep clear of unexpected explosions and obstacles in the city, while defending yourself and running away from horde of zombies who occupy the streets and sewers of the city. This makes the game very challenging and great fun to play.The only way for Leon to survive is to constantly run away and to eliminate anything that stands in his way (abandoned cars, blood-thirsty zombies, other obstacles), with range of weapons that can be found in the different parts of the city.So get ready for the run of your life!* Realistic and immersive game environment with great * sound effects.* Ability to upgrade your weapons.* Fast-paced, innovative and challenging game-play.* Dynamically generated game stages make it extra funHow to play? Simple!* Navigate through using tilt controls* Swipe up to jump over barriers* Swipe down to duck under objects* Aim at enemy and shoot automatically* Tap screen to reload bullet******3D Ctiy Run 2******Recommended you strongly,What are you waiting for? Download now to experience the fun.Jelly.K studioï¼Donât be stingy with your review. Give us feedback so we can make it better! Thanks!

reviews.title: Don\'t Bother
reviews.comment: Lousy game..don\'t bother NOT * Realistic and immersive game environment with great * sound effects. WHAT FOR?? * Ability to upgrade your weapons. NOT * Fast-paced, innovative and challenging game-play. NOT * Dynamically generated game stages make it extra fun Not NEW * Navigate through using tilt controls Not New * Swipe up to jump over barriers Not New  * Swipe down to duck under objects Not New * Aim at enemy and shoot automatically Not New * Tap screen to reload bullet
reviews.author: Cesar Augusto

reviews.title: Are you flipping kidding me?
reviews.comment: The amount of pop ups and ridiculous ads make this game impossible to play. You literally cannot play 5 seconds of the game without multiple pop ups coming up. Learn from some of the top developers... you can make money without whoring yourself out. Way to make an awesome looking game completely unplayable. you guys are idiots
reviews.author: eric mumper

reviews.title: pop ups
reviews.comment: I now know how to play without these annoying pop ups. PLAY WITHOUT AN INTERNET CONNECTION. IT WORKS
reviews.author: Kigenyi Shaban

reviews.title: Good but painful, can be improved
reviews.comment: This is the first ever game i have reviewed and rated,   GOOD:- * Nice game play * Not too difficult targets for coins.   BAD:- * Coin bonus in coin bags have a high percentage of giving you single digit rewards, for 250-300 coins not worth the effort.  * The monster running behind hampers game play,  Agreed there is a monster and its a third person runner but the monster is just too close!  Running gets really difficult   UGLY :- INSANE POP-UP ADDS HAMPERING GAME PLAY  so 2*
reviews.author: Kushal Karia

reviews.title: Good game, but...
reviews.comment: Definitely an addicting game, it\'s worth a try that\'s for sure.  but the game gets choppy sometimes, and very unresponsive. Like when you swipe up or down, he just reloads his gun making you run into walls and fall off cliffs, very very annoying.
